overview: The AI system has undergone a major transformation from a luxury chauffeur service app to a medical study companion app named Aorteq. This transformation involved the implementation of a comprehensive authentication flow, exam selection and study planning features, and a personalized study plan generation. The system architecture was also changed to Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) to ensure proper separation of concerns and maintainability.
key_events: Removal of all features related to luxury chauffeur services
Implementation of a comprehensive authentication flow
Addition of exam selection and study planning features
Creation of a personalized study plan generation feature
Implementation of a new UI design and navigation system
user_requests: User requested the transformation of the app into a medical study companion app called Aorteq
User requested the removal of the existing luxury chauffeur service features
User requested the implementation of a complete authentication flow
User requested the implementation of exam selection and study planning flow
User requested the generation of a personalized study plan
User requested the implementation of a new UI design and navigation system
system_responses: System planned to transform the existing app into Aorteq by implementing a comprehensive authentication flow, exam selection and study planning features, and a personalized study plan generation
System planned to remove existing features related to luxury chauffeur services
System planned to adopt MVVM architecture for the new features, ensuring proper separation of concerns and maintainability
System planned to update the navigation to include new screens and back button functionality
System planned to revise UI components to align with new design guidelines and support light/dark mode
System provided a detailed public interface diff outlining the architectural changes, component structure changes, additions, removals, and implications
current_state: The system has been successfully transformed into a medical study companion app called Aorteq. The existing luxury chauffeur service features have been removed. A comprehensive authentication flow, exam selection and study planning features, and a personalized study plan generation have been implemented. The system now follows the MVVM architecture with proper state management, UI/UX updates, and data model changes. The system is now ready for further testing and optimization.
